OCD.name: SLM Community Detection
OCD.description: The SLM is the improvement of the Louvain algorithm. See www.ludowaltman.nl/slm/ for more information.

AD.name: Weight
AD.description: The field used for the weight

AD.name: Random Seed
AD.description: Seed of the random number generator

AD.name: Resolution
AD.description: Use a value above (below) 1.0 if you want to obtain a larger (smaller) number of communities

AD.name: Iterations
AD.description: Number of iterations per random start
